description: Parsing Envoy access logs with Grafana Loki

targets.expr:
sum by (status_code) (count_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} 
| pattern `<_> "<method> <path> <protocol>" <status_code> <response_flags> <response_code_details> <connection_termination_details> "<failure_reason>" <bytes_received> <bytes_sent> <duration> <upstream_time> "<forward_for>" "<agent>" "<req_id>" "<authority>" "<upstream_host>" <upstream_cluster> <upstream_local_address> <downstream_local_address> <downstream_remote_address> <requested_server_name> <route_name>`  | __error__=""
 | status_code =~"0|2..|3..|4..|5.." 
[$__interval]))

sum by (upstream_cluster) (sum_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"}
| pattern `<_> "<method> <path> <protocol>" <status_code> <response_flags> <response_code_details> <connection_termination_details> "<failure_reason>" <bytes_received> <bytes_sent> <duration> <upstream_time> "<forward_for>" "<agent>" "<req_id>" "<authority>" "<upstream_host>" <upstream_cluster> <upstream_local_address> <downstream_local_address> <downstream_remote_address> <requested_server_name> <route_name>`
| unwrap bytes_sent
|  __error__=""
[$__interval]))

sum(count_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | pattern `<_> "<method> <path> <protocol>" <status_code> <response_flags> <response_code_details> <connection_termination_details> "<failure_reason>" <bytes_received> <bytes_sent> <duration> <upstream_time> "<forward_for>" "<agent>" "<req_id>" "<authority>" "<upstream_host>" <upstream_cluster> <upstream_local_address> <downstream_local_address> <downstream_remote_address> <requested_server_name> <route_name>` 
| status_code >= 500 |__error__="" [$__interval]))
/
(sum(count_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | pattern `<_> "<method> <path> <protocol>" <status_code> <response_flags> <response_code_details> <connection_termination_details> "<failure_reason>" <bytes_received> <bytes_sent> <duration> <upstream_time> "<forward_for>" "<agent>" "<req_id>" "<authority>" "<upstream_host>" <upstream_cluster> <upstream_local_address> <downstream_local_address> <downstream_remote_address> <requested_server_name> <route_name>` 
| __error__="" [$__interval])) / 100)

quantile_over_time(0.95,{$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"}
| pattern `<_> "<method> <path> <protocol>" <status_code> <response_flags> <response_code_details> <connection_termination_details> "<failure_reason>" <bytes_received> <bytes_sent> <duration> <upstream_time> "<forward_for>" "<agent>" "<req_id>" "<authority>" "<upstream_host>" <upstream_cluster> <upstream_local_address> <downstream_local_address> <downstream_remote_address> <requested_server_name> <route_name>`
| unwrap duration 
|  __error__=""  [$__interval]) by (host)

max by (host) (max_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"}| pattern `<_> "<method> <path> <protocol>" <status_code> <response_flags> <response_code_details> <connection_termination_details> "<failure_reason>" <bytes_received> <bytes_sent> <duration> <upstream_time> "<forward_for>" "<agent>" "<req_id>" "<authority>" "<upstream_host>" <upstream_cluster> <upstream_local_address> <downstream_local_address> <downstream_remote_address> <requested_server_name> <route_name>` 
| unwrap duration 
|  __error__=""  [$__interval]))

sum by (status_code) (count_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} 
| pattern `<_> "<method> <path> <protocol>" <status_code> <response_flags> <response_code_details> <connection_termination_details> "<failure_reason>" <bytes_received> <bytes_sent> <duration> <upstream_time> "<forward_for>" "<agent>" "<req_id>" "<authority>" "<upstream_host>" <upstream_cluster> <upstream_local_address> <downstream_local_address> <downstream_remote_address> <requested_server_name> <route_name>`  | __error__=""
 | status_code =~"0|2..|3..|4..|5.." 
[$__interval]))
sum by (host) (sum_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | json | status=200 | unwrap body_bytes_sent |  __error__="" [$__interval]))

sum by (host) (sum_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | pattern `<_> "<method> <path> <protocol>" <status_code> <response_flags> <response_code_details> <connection_termination_details> "<failure_reason>" <bytes_received> <bytes_sent> <duration> <upstream_time> "<forward_for>" "<agent>" "<req_id>" "<authority>" "<upstream_host>" <upstream_cluster> <upstream_local_address> <downstream_local_address> <downstream_remote_address> <requested_server_name> <route_name>`
| status_code=200 
| unwrap bytes_sent
|  __error__="" [$__interval]))

max_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"}
!~ `.ico|.svg|.css|.png|.txt|.js|.xml`
| pattern `<_> "<method> <path> <protocol>" <status_code> <response_flags> <response_code_details> <connection_termination_details> "<failure_reason>" <bytes_received> <bytes_sent> <duration> <upstream_time> "<forward_for>" "<agent>" "<req_id>" "<authority>" "<upstream_host>" <upstream_cluster> <upstream_local_address> <downstream_local_address> <downstream_remote_address> <requested_server_name> <route_name>`
| unwrap duration
| status_code = 200 and path != "/" 
| __error__="" [1h]) by (path)

panels.title: Top 10 paths by duration in last 1h

targets.expr: topk(10, sum by (forward_for) (count_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | pattern `<_> "<method> <path> <protocol>" <status_code> <response_flags> <response_code_details> <connection_termination_details> "<failure_reason>" <bytes_received> <bytes_sent> <duration> <upstream_time> "<forward_for>" "<agent>" "<req_id>" "<authority>" "<upstream_host>" <upstream_cluster> <upstream_local_address> <downstream_local_address> <downstream_remote_address> <requested_server_name> <route_name>` |  __error__="" [$__interval])))

topk(10, sum by (path) (count_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} 
!~ `.ico|.svg|.css|.png|.txt|.js|.xml`
| pattern `<_> "<method> <path> <protocol>" <status_code> <response_flags> <response_code_details> <connection_termination_details> "<failure_reason>" <bytes_received> <bytes_sent> <duration> <upstream_time> "<forward_for>" "<agent>" "<req_id>" "<authority>" "<upstream_host>" <upstream_cluster> <upstream_local_address> <downstream_local_address> <downstream_remote_address> <requested_server_name> <route_name>`
| status_code = 200 and path != "/" 
| __error__="" [7d])))

topk(10, sum by (agent) (count_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | pattern `<_> "<method> <path> <protocol>" <status_code> <response_flags> <response_code_details> <connection_termination_details> "<failure_reason>" <bytes_received> <bytes_sent> <duration> <upstream_time> "<forward_for>" "<agent>" "<req_id>" "<authority>" "<upstream_host>" <upstream_cluster> <upstream_local_address> <downstream_local_address> <downstream_remote_address> <requested_server_name> <route_name>`
| __error__="" [6h])))

title: Grafana Loki Dashboard for Istio Service Mesh
